comment: Fantastic German teacher. It takes a bit for her to warm up to the class, but once she does she's extremely nice and helpful. Doesn't grade roleplays too harshly. 11/10 professor, would take again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Awesome teacher! Would definitely recommend taking. She works with you if you need her to. Shes really sweet and patient. She's Austrian so she knows her stuff.
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--EXTRA CREDIT--Would take again
